name: MARZHION
description:
MARZHION is a First Person Role Play  game on Windows. Prepared to submit the final project of the 3rd year students of Dhurakij Pundit University College of Creative Design and Entertainment Technology majoring in Game Design and Development.

In MARZHION You play on the role of a brave man who must go out to find the three jewels, returning to seal the demons created by human greed and hatred. To protect the kingdom Your goal is Ching a mani from the demons' subordinates You will have to defeat hordes of demons and fight bosses and seal them with jewelers.

Controls Keyboard and mouse

Move             -           W A S D

Jump             -            Space

Attack          -           Left Click

Aim              -           Right Click

Setting         -           Tab
